item.description: A new teaser trailer for Part 3 of Bleach: Thousand-Year Blood War has dropped. SpanningÂ 138 seconds long, the freshly unveiled promotional video showcases all the key characters for Part 3 - The Conflict, new theme songs alongside a key visual.As the feud between the Quincies and the Soul Reapers culminates, the second cour concluded amid a fight between Yhwach and Ichibe, the commanding officer of theÂ Royal Guard for the Soul King Palace. Picking up from that, Part 3 - The Conflict will cover the end stages of this millennium war, with the teaser offering a glimpse at the eventual clash between Ichigo and Yhwach.The teaser also previews new opening and ending theme songs for the upcoming installment, featuringÂ â€œKotoba ni Sezu Tomo - Even if You Don't Say It,â€ an upbeat and melodic song by J-Rock band, SIX LOUNGE that captures the speed and chaos for the upcoming fights in the anime. Produced and performed by suisoh, â€œMonochrome,â€ the ending theme brings out the emotional aspects of the arc in a stylishly melancholic track.Bleach: Thousand-Year Blood War Part 3 - The Conflict is set to premiere this October.
